name: Shelfless (Hazno-dev)
description:
“Shelfless - 100% Off” is a retro-heist game tasking you with the goal of infiltrating the generic supermarket chain known as “GigaMart” and grab as many items as possible without being caught by the several defences GigaMart has put in place.

Avoid staff, cameras and the dangerous pursuit of 1 angry security guard and try and steal as many items as possible before you become exposed. Once exposed, the game shifts as you need to run and avoid the staff as you make a dash for the exit.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Pickup Items

LMB - Drop Items

RMB - Conceal Items

Tab - Inventory

P - Pause

Shelfless has been released this January for free! Now that’s a steal.
